links.title: Apple Inks Deal for 'Defending Jacob' Series Starring Chris Evans
links.description: Apple has given a straight-to-series order for drama series "Defending Jacob," which will star Chris Evans, known for his roles in "Captain America" and "The Avengers," reports . "Defending Jacob" is a thriller based on William Landay's bestselling novel of the same title.

links.description: The potential reward is huge. The smart home market is expected to grow into a $53 billion industry by 2022, according to Zion Market Research. With Amazon taking an early lead in this space, it could open up a massive new revenue channel for the company going forward.
